div.p: Smolt and egg numbers and winter temperatures at Burrishoole since 1972. ( a) smolt numbers ('000, open circle) and egg numbers (million, filled circle) for that smolt cohort plotted against smolt migration year, 1972–2006; ( b) egg to smolt per cent survival (filled circle) and the percentage of ranched eggs (open circle) in that egg cohort plotted against smolt migration year, 1972–2006; ( c) mean winter (DJF) SWT (°C) in Lough Feeagh, 1972–2006.
